addResource

public void addResource(String relUrl,
                        String content,
                        String charset)
                 throws IOException
Add Resource The charset is not used ; it only goes to addResource(String relUrl, String content).

Parameters:
relUrl - module relative path
content - module content
charset - module charset (not used)
Throws:
IOException - thrown if module is not found
